product_name: The North Face Apex Pneumatic Jacket - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Run, hike, climb or mountain bike in The North Face Apex Pneumatic jacket for men. This weather-resistant jacket with 4-way stretch stays breathable when you pick up the pace.
